entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:59 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 5:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -12.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: SW 24 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
